Text:
Alan you are quickly becoming one of my favorite uploaders.  I have 2 young grandchildren and so on their behalf I thank you greatly for all your hard work.  Great job.
Video 10/10
Audio 10/10

A=9, V=9, M=8
Excellent quality DVD rip!!

many thanks

I can't get this to play with VLC Media Player and can't figure out how to install the codec (or even find it) to make it play. This is the very first file after years of use that VLC has failed me. Any suggestions on how to get this file to play? All I get is the audio. :(
Never mind, never mind... it's been a couple of months since I updated my version of VLC MP so it's working now I've updated my player. :)
@binky thanks for showing us that noobs can get it right too with some simple common sense :)
